main event: A civilian observer reported seeing two unidentified objects in the sky near Turnersfalls, Massachusetts on April 7, 1967.
interesting points: The objects appeared as bright, glowing lights that had no distinct outline and moved rapidly through the sky.
The observer estimated the objects were traveling at speeds of around 2,000+ mph.
The objects were seen to suddenly disappear and reappear, change brightness, and change shape.
The observer had previously reported seeing similar objects on April 17, 1957 and April 29, 1957.
The Air Force requested the observer complete an additional report form for further investigation.
